abstract: MasterCard plans to open its platform so developers can use its payment technology in mobile and Web apps.
snippet: MasterCard plans to open its platform so developers can use its payment technology in mobile and Web apps.
lead_paragraph: There has been a lot of talk about digital forms of payment replacing cash and even credit cards. But MasterCard intends to stay in the middle of the technological innovation.

headline.main: MasterCard Wants Programmers to Use Its Payment Technology
